It's a solid shooter game that can run on just about anything at decent FPS, I don't recommend it without prime, too many hackers in non-prime lobbies.
fps düşüklüğü (bilgisayarım kötü olduğu için) fakat yıllardır oynarım ve gayet güzel bir oyun ama bazı buglar oluyor bu insanın canını sıkan şeyler tabi.

Great game, as long as you're in high trust factor prime matchmaking. For a new player, coming in with a free account, it can be pretty tough since hackers are fairly prevalent within the community. It can be very fun though so don't be afraid to try it out. You don't need much to run the game either, as it offers good settings to increase your frame rate. 
Watch some YouTube videos, learn some spray control and movement, along with some map sense, and you can really start to enjoy this game for what it is.
But please, for love of God, GET HEADPHONES W/ A MIC AND USE THEM.

What I've learned from playing this game for over 4,000 hours is that.. If you can't clutch, prepare to be kicked.
Love playing some of the workshop maps with friends, but its also a lot of fun to play comp with your buddies or a few strangers.

Some toxic players as expected, but over the 2-3 years I've played this game, I continually come back because of the fun rando lobbies I get 95% of the time and the truly epic gamer moments I witness with fun players. 10/10.
CSGO is very competitive game with a very toxic community behind it. But if you can get past that it can be a fun and wholesome game.
